name: Super Admin
description: Super Admin has access to all the resources and can perform any operation on them.

name: Administrator
description: Administrator has access to most of the resources and can manage user accounts, settings, and other administrative tasks.

name: Developer
description: Developer has access to development resources and can manage code, deploy applications, and perform other development-related tasks.

name: Human Resources
description: Human Resources can manage employee records, handle recruitment processes, and oversee employee relations and benefits.

name: HR Manager
description: HR Manager oversees the Human Resources department, manages HR staff, and ensures compliance with labor laws and company policies.

name: Department Manager
description: Department Manager is responsible for managing a specific department, overseeing staff, and ensuring departmental goals are met.

name: Department Assistant
description: Department Assistant supports the Department Manager with administrative tasks, scheduling, and coordination of departmental activities.

name: User
description: User has access to basic resources and can perform standard operations within their permissions.

name: Guest
description: Guest has limited access to resources and can only view certain information without making any changes.
